0.title: Authorizes a $150 million annual cap for incentives granted for certain aerospace projects and exempts the incentives from the aggregate caps of the Missouri Works, BUILD, and Missouri Works Training programs and the Real Property Tax Increment Redevelopment Act
0.description: Authorizes a $150 million annual cap for incentives granted for certain aerospace projects and exempts the incentives from the aggregate caps of the Missouri Works, BUILD, and Missouri Works Training programs and the Real Property Tax Increment Redevelopment Act

1.title: Requires any proposed legislation that would increase state funding or other benefits for specified economic development programs or incentives to contain certain components
1.description: Requires any proposed legislation that would increase state funding or other benefits for specified economic development programs or incentives to contain certain components

2.title: Special Session Resolution for opening of session
2.description: Special Session Resolution for opening of session

3.title: Authorizes incentives for aerospace industry job creation under existing programs except with a separate incentives cap
3.description: Authorizes incentives for aerospace industry job creation under existing programs except with a separate incentives cap
